sections.heading: THREE YEAR PRESCRIPTIONArt. 3494
sections.text: Actions subject to a three-year prescriptionThe following actions are subject to a liberative prescription of three years:(1) An action for the recovery of compensation for services rendered, including payment of salaries, wages, commissions, professional fees, fees
